message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,500. I believe it's incredibly valuable, and this is a very fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I understand your perspective, but $11,250 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
